member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Business.ContextManagers.OpenAIContextManager
member.summary: Manages the context for interactions with the OpenAI API, handling session states, user inputs, and responses.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.AIModels.GetModelsEndpoint
member.summary: Endpoint to fetch available ai models.

member.name: M:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.AIModels.GetModelsEndpoint.GetAvailableModels
member.summary: Retrieves a list of available models.
member.returns: A list of strings representing the names or identifiers of available models.
member.remarks: This method is typically used to fetch the available model names that can be selected or used in the application.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.CompareEndpoint
member.summary: Endpoint that handles comparison requests between two AI providers, accepting a CompareRequest and returning a CompareResponse. Processes parallel calls to different AI providers and aggregates their responses.

member.name: M:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.CompareEndpoint.#ctor(ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Infrastructure.Services.Interfaces.IAIProviderFactory)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.CompareRequest
member.summary: Represents a request to compare responses between two AI providers.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.CompareRequest.Prompt
member.summary: Gets or sets the common prompt or input text to be used for the AI model call.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.CompareRequest.LeftProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the provider selection configuration for the left side comparison.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.CompareRequest.RightProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the provider selection configuration for the right side comparison.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.ProviderSelection
member.summary: Represents the configuration for selecting a specific AI provider and model.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.ProviderSelection.Provider
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the AI provider (e.g., "OpenAI", "Deepseek").

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.ProviderSelection.Model
member.summary: Gets or sets the specific model identifier for the selected provider (e.g., "gpt-4", "R1", "gpt-3.5-turbo").

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.CompareResponse
member.summary: Represents the response containing comparison results from two AI providers.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.CompareResponse.LeftResult
member.summary: Gets or sets the response result from the left provider.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.CompareResponse.RightResult
member.summary: Gets or sets the response result from the right provider.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.ProviderResult
member.summary: Represents the detailed result of an AI provider's response including performance metrics.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.ProviderResult.Message
member.summary: Gets or sets the response message returned by the AI model.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.ProviderResult.TotalTokens
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of tokens used, including both request and response.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.ProviderResult.Cost
member.summary: Gets or sets the calculated cost for the request.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Features.Compare.ProviderResult.TimeTakenMs
member.summary: Gets or sets the time taken in milliseconds to complete the API call.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Infrastructure.Services.Factory.AIProviderFactory
member.summary: Factory responsible for creating instances of AI provider services based on provider name.

member.name: F:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Infrastructure.Services.Factory.AIProviderFactory._serviceProvider
member.summary: The service provider used to resolve dependencies.

member.name: M:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Infrastructure.Services.Factory.AIProviderFactory.#ctor(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Infrastructure.Services.Factory.AIProviderFactory.GetProviderService(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the appropriate AI provider service implementation based on the provider name.
member.param: The name of the AI provider to instantiate.
member.returns: An implementation of IAIProviderService for the specified provider.
member.exception: Thrown when the specified provider is not supported.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Infrastructure.Services.Interfaces.IAIProviderFactory
member.summary: Defines the interface for factory services that create AI provider instances.

member.name: M:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Infrastructure.Services.Interfaces.IAIProviderFactory.GetProviderService(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the appropriate AI provider service implementation based on the provider name.
member.param: The name of the AI provider to instantiate.
member.returns: An implementation of IAIProviderService for the specified provider.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Infrastructure.Services.Interfaces.IAIProviderService
member.summary: Defines the interface for services that interact with external AI provider APIs.

member.name: M:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Infrastructure.Services.Interfaces.IAIProviderService.CallModelAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calls the external AI model API.
member.param: The name of the model to use (e.g., "gpt-4").
member.returns: A ProviderResult containing the response, token count, cost, and time taken.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Infrastructure.Services.Providers.OpenAIService
member.summary: Service implementation for interacting with OpenAI's API endpoints. Handles model calls, token counting, and cost calculations specific to OpenAI models.

member.name: M:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Infrastructure.Services.Providers.OpenAIService.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.Configurations.AIEndpointsConfig})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Infrastructure.Services.Providers.OpenAIService.CallModelAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Calls OpenAI's API with the specified model and prompt to generate a response.
member.param: The name of the OpenAI model to use (e.g., "gpt-4", "gpt-3.5-turbo").
The input prompt to send to the model.
member.returns: A ProviderResult containing the model's response, token usage, calculated cost, and time taken.
member.exception: Thrown when the API request fails.
Thrown when the model name is invalid or unsupported.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.OpenAICompletionResponse
member.summary: Represents the response from the OpenAI completion API.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.OpenAICompletionResponse.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the response.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.OpenAICompletionResponse.ObjectType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of object returned.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.OpenAICompletionResponse.Created
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp when the response was created.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.OpenAICompletionResponse.Model
member.summary: Gets or sets the model used for the completion.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.OpenAICompletionResponse.Usage
member.summary: Gets or sets the usage information for the request.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.OpenAICompletionResponse.Choices
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of choices returned by the model.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.Usage
member.summary: Represents the usage statistics for the OpenAI completion request.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.Usage.PromptTokens
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of tokens used in the prompt.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.Usage.CompletionTokens
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of tokens used in the completion.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.Usage.TotalTokens
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of tokens used in the request.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.Choice
member.summary: Represents a choice returned by the OpenAI completion API.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.Choice.Message
member.summary: Gets or sets the message associated with the choice.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.Choice.FinishReason
member.summary: Gets or sets the reason for finishing the response.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.Choice.Index
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the choice in the list of choices.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.Message
member.summary: Represents a message in the OpenAI completion response.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.Message.Role
member.summary: Gets or sets the role of the message sender (e.g., user, assistant).

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.CompletionResponses.Message.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the content of the message.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.Configurations.AIEndpointsConfig
member.summary: Configuration class for AI provider endpoints.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.Configurations.AIEndpointsConfig.Providers
member.summary: Gets or sets Dictionary containing AI provider configurations, where the key is the provider name.

member.name: T:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.Configurations.ProviderConfig
member.summary: Represents the configuration for an AI provider.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.Configurations.ProviderConfig.BaseUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the base URL of the AI provider's API.

member.name: P:ChatbotBenchmarkAPI.Models.Configurations.ProviderConfig.Endpoints
member.summary: Gets or sets Dictionary of API endpoints for the AI provider, where the key is the endpoint name and the value is the corresponding URL path.
